devdoc.details: A router contract that facilitates liquidity provision and trading on Chromatic.

NotMarket().details: Throws an error indicating that the caller is not a registered market.

AccountCreated(address,address).details: Emitted when a new account is created.

params.account: The address of the created account.
params.owner: The address of the owner of the created account.

params.amount: The amount to add as liquidity.
params.feeRate: The fee rate of the liquidity bin.
params.market: The address of the ChromaticMarket contract.

params.amounts: An array of amounts to add as liquidity for each bin.
params.feeRates: An array of fee rates for each liquidity bin.
params.market: The address of the ChromaticMarket contract.
params.recipient: The address of the recipient for each liquidity bin.

params.data: Additional data associated with the liquidity addition.
params.settlementToken: The address of the settlement token used for adding liquidity.
params.vault: The address of the vault where the liquidity is added.

params.market: The address of the ChromaticMarket contract.
params.receiptId: The ID of the LP receipt.

params.market: The address of the ChromaticMarket contract.
params.receiptIds: An array of LP receipt IDs to claim liquidity from.

params.data: Additional data associated with the liquidity claim.
params.receiptId: The ID of the liquidity claim receipt.

params.market: The address of the ChromaticMarket contract.
params.positionId: The ID of the position to claim.

params.market: The address of the ChromaticMarket contract.
params.positionId: The ID of the position to close.

params._marketFactory: The address of the ChromaticMarketFactory contract.

createAccount().details: Only one account can be created per user.      Emits an `AccountCreated` event upon successful creation.

params.market: The address of the ChromaticMarket contract.

returns._0: An array of LP receipt IDs.

params.market: The address of the ChromaticMarket contract.

returns._0: An array of LP receipt IDs.

openPosition(address,int224,uint32,uint2.details: Opens a new position in a ChromaticMarket contract.

params.makerMargin: The margin amount for the maker.
params.market: The address of the ChromaticMarket contract.
params.takerMargin: The margin amount for the taker.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

params.clbTokenAmount: The amount of CLB tokens to remove as liquidity.
params.feeRate: The fee rate of the liquidity bin.
params.market: The address of the ChromaticMarket contract.

params.clbTokenAmounts: An array of CLB token amounts to remove as liquidity for each bin.
params.feeRates: An array of fee rates for each liquidity bin.
params.market: The address of the ChromaticMarket contract.
params.recipient: The address of the recipient for each liquidity bin.

params.clbToken: The address of the Chromatic liquidity token.
params.clbTokenId: The ID of the Chromatic liquidity token to be removed.
params.data: Additional data associated with the liquidity removal.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params.market: The address of the ChromaticMarket contract.
params.receiptId: The ID of the LP receipt.

params.market: The address of the ChromaticMarket contract.
params.receiptIds: An array of LP receipt IDs to withdraw liquidity from.

params.data: Additional data associated with the liquidity withdrawal.
params.receiptId: The ID of the liquidity withdrawal receipt.

devdoc.title: ChromaticRouter

addLiquidity(address,int16,uint256,addre.notice: Adds liquidity to a ChromaticMarket contract.

addLiquidityBatch(address,address,int16[.notice: Adds liquidity to multiple ChromaticMarket contracts in a batch.

addLiquidityCallback(address,address,byt.notice: Handles the callback after adding liquidity to the Chromatic protocol.

claimLiquidity(address,uint256).notice: Claims liquidity from a ChromaticMarket contract.

claimLiquidityBatch(address,uint256[]).notice: Claims liquidity from multiple ChromaticMarket contracts in a batch.

claimLiquidityCallback(uint256,bytes).notice: Handles the callback after claiming liquidity from the Chromatic protocol.

claimPosition(address,uint256).notice: Claims a position from a ChromaticMarket contract.

closePosition(address,uint256).notice: Closes a position in a ChromaticMarket contract.

getAccount().notice: Retrieves the account of the caller.

getLpReceiptIds(address).notice: Retrieves the LP receipt IDs of the caller for the specified market.

getLpReceiptIds(address,address).notice: Get the LP receipt IDs associated with a specific market and owner.

removeLiquidity(address,int16,uint256,ad.notice: Removes liquidity from a ChromaticMarket contract.

removeLiquidityBatch(address,address,int.notice: Removes liquidity from multiple ChromaticMarket contracts in a batch.

removeLiquidityCallback(address,uint256,.notice: Handles the callback after removing liquidity from the Chromatic protocol.

withdrawLiquidity(address,uint256).notice: Withdraws liquidity from a ChromaticMarket contract.

withdrawLiquidityBatch(address,uint256[].notice: Withdraws liquidity from multiple ChromaticMarket contracts in a batch.

withdrawLiquidityCallback(uint256,bytes).notice: Handles the callback after withdrawing liquidity from the Chromatic protocol.
